sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import { useParams, useLocation, useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Card, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import { getOrderDetails } from '../actions/orderActions' function OrderScreen() { const params = useParams() const location = useLocation() const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const orderDetails = useSelector(state => state.orderDetails) const {order, error, loading} = orderDetails const orderId = params.id console.log(orderDetails) if(!loading && !error){ order.itemsPrice = order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0).toFixed(2) } useEffect(() => { if(!order || order._id !== Number(orderId)){ console.log('details') dispatch(getOrderDetails(orderId)) } }, [order, orderId]) return loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

Order: {order._id}

Shipping

Name: {order.user.name}

Name: {order.user.email}

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city} {' '} {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {' '} {order.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {order.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{order.orderItems.length === 0 ? Order is empty : ( {order.orderItems.map((item,index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} X ${item.price} = ${(item.qty * item.price).toFixed(2)} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Item: ${order.itemsPrice} Shipping: ${order.shippingPrice} Tax: ${order.taxPrice} Total: ${order.totalPrice} {error && {error}}
) } export default OrderScreen
